snippet: A 15-year-old Massachusetts boy charged with killing his teacher last year faces new charges after an assault on a state youth services staffer....

headline.print_headline: Teacher Slaying Suspect Charged in June Assault
headline.main: Teacher Slaying Suspect Charged in June Assault

lead_paragraph: A 15-year-old Massachusetts boy charged with killing his teacher last year faces new charges after an assault on a state youth services staffer.
